column1: 'Two Column List' is only available in MANAdev themes
column2: 'Two Column List' is only available in MANAdev themes

column1: Change appearance of various blocks by entering one of predefined style names or even your own. This theme supports 'm-transparent', 'm-pink', 'm-lightgrey' and 'm-darkgrey', 'm-blue', 'm-line', 'm-shadow', 'm-top-shadow', 'm-right-shadow', 'm-bottom-shadow', 'm-left-shadow'. You may enter several style names separated by space.
column2: Change appearance of various blocks by entering one of predefined style names or even your own. This theme supports 'm-transparent', 'm-pink', 'm-lightgrey' and 'm-darkgrey', 'm-blue', 'm-line', 'm-shadow', 'm-top-shadow', 'm-right-shadow', 'm-bottom-shadow', 'm-left-shadow'. You may enter several style names separated by space.

column1: Enter two numbers (width and height) separated by colon like 3:4, 1:1, etc. In this theme image width is preset, but height will be adjusted according to this setting
column2: Enter two numbers (width and height) separated by colon like 3:4, 1:1, etc. In this theme image width is preset, but height will be adjusted according to this setting

column1: This options adds 'Compare' action to top links if there are at least 2 products to be compared
column2: This options adds 'Compare' action to top links if there are at least 2 products to be compared
